ValidationRule.description: Only allows program for Horizon to be Cardiac, Renew or Respiratory
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: IF(ISPICKVAL( ClientName__c , "Horizon"),IF(OR(ISPICKVAL( AbleToProgram__c , "Renew"),ISPICKVAL(AbleToProgram__c , "Respiratory"),ISPICKVAL(AbleToProgram__c , "Cardiac Health Forum"), ISPICKVAL(AbleToProgram__c , "Not Indicated")),FALSE,TRUE),FALSE)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Horizon members can only be scheduled for Cardiac, Renew or Respiratory programs. Please choose an appropriate selection.
